name: HousingInstabilityScreeningAssessmentsQuestions
title: Housing Instability Screening Assessments Questions
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents screening assessment questions for Housing Instability as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessment questions in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses for this SDOH domain (e.g., for the SDOHCC Observation Screening Response profile in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for SDOH screening assessment questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)

concept.display: Are you worried about losing your housing [PRAPARE]
Are you homeless or worried that you might be in the future [WellRx]
Emergent risk of becoming homeless Caregiver
Would like help for being at risk of becoming homeless Caregiver
At risk of becoming homeless Caregiver
Behind on rent or mortgage in past 12 months
Number of residential moves in past 12 months
Worried about housing stability in next 2 months
